title: How to write a book in 1 hour - Quora

response.answer_text: You can write a book in one hour easily if you have whole content or story in your mind. This book will be simple and can have some mistakes. But for writing a good book you should give it more time. First you should understand about your content and then try to read book of best authors related to your content . Take some basic ideas from that book and then start to continue writing…..
That book will not be a book then.
